entry.title: Saturday night: A few showers. Low 7.
entry.summary: A few showers ending overnight then mainly cloudy. Risk of a thunderstorm late this evening and after midnight. Fog patches developing overnight. Wind southwest 30 km/h gusting to 50 becoming light overnight. Low 7. Forecast issued 9:43 PM EDT Saturday 29 April 2023

entry.title: Sunday: Chance of showers. High 10. POP 40%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy. 40 percent chance of showers late in the morning and in the afternoon. Fog patches dissipating in the morning. Wind becoming southwest 30 km/h in the afternoon. High 10. UV index 5 or moderate. Forecast issued 9:43 PM EDT Saturday 29 April 2023

entry.title: Sunday night: A few showers. Low plus 3.
entry.summary: Showers. Risk of a thunderstorm in the evening. Wind southwest 20 km/h gusting to 40. Low plus 3. Forecast issued 9:43 PM EDT Saturday 29 April 2023
